title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements, including regulatory compliance needs and performance goals. Conduct market research and gather stakeholder feedback.

title: Architecture Design for BetHedge
description:
Design the overall system architecture for the BetHedge sports betting application. The design should include:
1. Edge computing infrastructure for improved performance.
2. Components addressing regulatory requirements.
3. Data storage and security measures, with emphasis on compliance with relevant data protection laws.
4. Scalability considerations, including strategies for handling increased user load during peak events.
5. Performance optimizations, such as caching, lazy loading, and minimizing HTTP requests.
6. Integration of third-party services (e.g., payment gateways, identity verification), with a focus on API design and secure authentication methods.
7. Clear separation of concerns between the frontend, backend, and edge components, using well-defined APIs and interfaces.
8. Modularity and maintainability guidelines, ensuring that each component can be updated or replaced independently.
9. Error handling, edge cases, and performance optimizations considerations, including fallback mechanisms and graceful degradation strategies.
10. Comprehensive documentation in a clear, concise technical writing style, with examples and visual aids where appropriate.
11. Review of the design with relevant stakeholders and incorporation of their feedback.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user data, betting information, and regulatory compliance data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side logic for handling betting operations, regulatory compliance, and integration with edge computing infrastructure.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for the sports betting application, ensuring a smooth and responsive experience.

title: Edge Computing Infrastructure Setup
description: Set up the edge computing infrastructure to ensure low latency and high performance for the application.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations for sports betting and data privacy.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the application's functionality, performance, and compliance with regulatory requirements.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the application to the edge computing infrastructure and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms for performance and compliance tracking.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the application, including user guides, technical documentation, and support resources.
